thread.title: Amazing room, service and staff!
thread.title_full: Amazing room, service and staff! - Review of Hilton Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: husainbb
title: Amazing room, service and staff!
text: Had a great experience with Hilton Times Square again! These guys really make sure to offer the highest level of service and want to make the client happy. Thank you to Oscar for his quick and speedy response! I wish every hotel had someone with his dedication to quality and customer satisfaction. As well if you're having breakfast make sure to ask for Francisco, great service. Also, did I mention the location is great :)
